title: The future of Zoom
description:
Will Zoom continue to be the dominant video conference service after the pandemic ends? Recode’s Rani Molla discusses just how successful the company has been this past year and what plans they have to stay in the game after our need to Zoom decreases.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
